languages.text: "Вотчины огиров... Когда-то я бывал здесь, в этом регионе. Бедные на достойную добычу места. Богатые на опасных противников".
"Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."
languages.original_text: "Вотчины огиров... Когда-то я бывал здесь, в этом регионе. Бедные на достойную добычу места. Богатые на опасных противников".

traits.locale_text: "Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."

languages.text: “是遗落者的领地……我以前来过这里一次。这里没有什么像样的猎物，到处都是危险的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."

traits.locale_text: “是遗落者的领地……我以前来过这里一次。这里没有什么像样的猎物，到处都是危险的敌人。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Le territoire des Oghyrs... Je suis déjà venu dans cette région. On n'y trouve, hélas, aucune proie digne de ce nom. En revanche, ça regorge d'adversaires plus redoutables les uns que les autres. »
languages.original_text: "Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."

traits.locale_text: « Le territoire des Oghyrs... Je suis déjà venu dans cette région. On n'y trouve, hélas, aucune proie digne de ce nom. En revanche, ça regorge d'adversaires plus redoutables les uns que les autres. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Territorio Oghyr... He estado aquí una vez anteriormente. Las presas decentes escasean. No así los enemigos peligrosos».
languages.original_text: "Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."

traits.locale_text: «Territorio Oghyr... He estado aquí una vez anteriormente. Las presas decentes escasean. No así los enemigos peligrosos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「オグハイルの領土…この地域には以前一度来たことがある。まともな獲物には乏しく 危険な敵が多い」
languages.original_text: "Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."

traits.locale_text: 「オグハイルの領土…この地域には以前一度来たことがある。まともな獲物には乏しく 危険な敵が多い」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Oghyr-Territorium ... Ich war schon einmal in dieser Region. Arm an vernünftiger Beute. Reich an gefährlichen Widersachern."
languages.original_text: "Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."

traits.locale_text: "Oghyr-Territorium ... Ich war schon einmal in dieser Region. Arm an vernünftiger Beute. Reich an gefährlichen Widersachern."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."

languages.text: "Oghyr bölgesi. Daha önce buraya bir kez gelmiştim. Avları pek iyi olmasa da tehlikeli düşmanları bol."
languages.original_text: "Oghyr territory... I have been in this region once before. Poor in decent prey. Rich in dangerous adversaries."

traits.locale_text: "Oghyr bölgesi. Daha önce buraya bir kez gelmiştim. Avları pek de iyi olmasa da tehlikeli düşmanları bol."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
